name: Inlet pipes installed, correct grade and level
Pump lines installed correct grade and level
Non returns installed and correct direction
All flanges sealed and bolts tightened
Pump chamber clean and clear before pumps are installed
Chains on each pump & pumps able to be removed from top of chamber
Level sensors installed at correct heights
Anti vortex plate installed under pumps
All chambers clean and clear and drain between chambers operating.
Visual check (for leaks from valves, tees, saddles, etc)
